description: Everton are preparing a new deal for Jordan Pickford, Paris St-Germain could offer Arsenal chance to sign Kolo Muani, and Club Brugge's Maxim De Cuyper attracts Premier League interest, plus more.
title: Football gossip: Pickford, Muani, Cuyper, Butler-Oyedeji, Osimhen, Wirtz
title_page: Football gossip: Pickford, Muani, Cuyper, Butler-Oyedeji, Osimhen, Wirtz - BBC Sport
maintext:
Everton prepare new deal for Jordan Pickford, Paris St-Germain could offer Arsenal chance to sign Randal Kolo Muani, Club Brugge's Maxim de Cuyper attracts Premier League interest.
Everton are preparing to offer 30-year-old England goalkeeper Jordan Pickford a new deal which will keep him at the club for the remainder of his career. (TBR Football), external
Paris St-Germain are likely to offer Arsenal the chance to sign their out-of-favour France forward Randal Kolo Muani, 26. (Standard) , external
Chelsea, Arsenal and Tottenham have all sent scouts to watch Club Brugge and Belgium full-back Maxim de Cuyper, 24. (Caughtoffside) , external
FC Zurich have approached Arsenal to enquire about the availability of 21-year-old English forward Nathan Butler-Oyedeji in January. (Football Insider), external
Manchester United have been offered the chance to sign Nigeria striker Victor Osimhen in January, with Napoli open to a player-exchange deal for the 25-year-old, who is currently on loan at Galatasaray. (TBR Football) , external
Brighton Under-18s boss Inigo Calderon, 42, is in advanced talks to become Bristol Rovers manager. (Sky Sports), external
Bayern Munich remain hopeful of a summer move for 21-year-old Germany attacking midfielder Florian Wirtz, who is in discussions with Bayer Leverkusen over a new deal. (Sky Germany), external
Leicester City boss Ruud van Nistelrooy could lean on his Manchester United connections to land a suitable loan signing in January. (Football Insider), external
